wikipedia_page.main: John Barton is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 646), and Wigan, as a prop, i.e. number 8 or 10, during the era of contested scrums.

response: John Barton may refer to:

*John Barton (missionary) (1836–1908), English Anglican priest

*John Barton (footballer, born 1953), English footballer
